name: A Bigger Hole
description:
Join Savanna on another hole digging adventure, and learn a thing or two about friendship the illuminati along the way

NEW FEATURES:

  • Fewer Forgotten Counter Tags
  • Giant Worms??????????
  • Optional Unwinnable Battle with Aztec Goddess of Filth
  • Gorgon BFF

"A compelling narrative drives two friends ever deeper into the depths of the world, and each other. You'd best start believing in holes, Miss Turner - you're in one."
- award winning gaming journalist Sara "sarawizard" Langston

Cover image art by Brittany!

Euryale sprite ALSO by Brittany!

Songs: 

-Build That Wall by Darren Korb

-Wandering Daughter by Kimya Dawson
